text: Kirwin Christoffels (born 31 October 1994) is a South African first-class cricketer. He was part of South Africa's squad for the 2014 ICC Under-19 Cricket World Cup. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:South African cricketers Category:Eastern Province cricketers Category:People from Queenstown, Eastern Cape
title: Kirwin Christoffels
